Description: Feel free to contact me for a in hand inspection!PLEASE SCROLL DOWN FOR MORE PICS!!Great Player! 1986 Kramer Focus 6000 Electric GuitarMade In Japan Older EMG's & Original German Floyd Rose PLEASE DO NOT mistake picture glare for flaws.. If you think your seeing something not mentioned in this listing, please ask!! There are lots of pics, so when you receive it, its exactly what you expected, if not better. No surprises with this sale.. Buy with confidence! Here's The Run Down: This is a Great Playing 1986 Kramer Focus 6000 that was played some, but still in great shape overall. The Original Candy Red Finish is in very good condition for a 80's shredder. There are some flaws here and there from handling, play and age, but nothing that would effect the guitars function (see pics). Flaws may consist of but not limited to minor scratching, scuffs, marks and few dings (see pics). There is minor fret wear to speak of and nothing that I would classify as actual buckle rash, although there is some minor scratching on the back. The original hardware is in very good condition, but does show minor wear/discoloring as you would expect of a pre owned 33+/- year old guitar (pictured). I tried to take really good pics, so you can judge for yourself (see pics). The only change I can see are the addition of EMG's which were most likely added long ago. They are not current. There are NO breaks, repairs or notable damage. All electronics operate perfectly. If your looking for a super cool, great playing & looking Vintage Kramer that wont break the bank, this would make a great addition to your collection! AND Vintage 70s Electra X290 Electric Guitar Plays & Sounds Excellent Made In JapanOriginal Electra MMK45 Pickups! No Repairs PLEASE DO NOT mistake picture glare for flaws.. YOUR SEEING CLOUDS FROM THE SKY.. If you think your seeing something not mentioned in this listing, please ask!!There are lots of pics, so when you receive it, its exactly what you expected, if not better. No surprises with this sale.. Buy with confidence!Here's The Run Down:This is a great sounding & playing 70s Electra X290 Electric Guitar! It is 40+/- years old, so there will be cosmetic flaws here and there, but still in very respectful condition for its age. Flaws will consist of marks, scuffs, scratches, dings, chips & finish fading from being played/handled, but nothing that would effect the integrity or playability of the guitar (see pics). I guess you can say its beautifully road worn. There is minor fret wear, but plays perfectly as it sits (see pics). There is some discoloration of the hardware. I tried to take really good pics, so you can zoom in and judge its overall condition for yourself (see pics). There are NO repairs. All electronics are original, repair free and operate perfectly. If your looking for a Super Cool, Vintage Japanese Made Guitar that wont break the bank, this would make a great addition to your collection at a bargain price!This Electra X290 sounds and plays awesome! In my opinion it plays and sounds as good as any $1000 guitar out there. Although I think its set up nicely, everyone has their own preferences. If your not happy with its set up, it will be your responsibility and cost to have it set up to your liking. The neck is straight and the truss rod operates as it should. All electronics are original and operate perfectly! ***Will come exactly as pictured*** This 80's Kramer Focus sounds and plays great! Although I think its set up great, everyone has their own preferences. If your not happy with its set up, it will be your responsibility and cost to have it set up to your liking. The neck is straight and the truss rod operates as it should. All electronics are original and perfect! A new set of Super Slinky 9's will be included in the case. Everything operates as it should, and has never had, nor does it have any breaks or repairs unless noted above. Make sure you view all of the pics and ask questions if you have any concerns before buying. I will ship this item over seas, but you must contact me for a shipping quote before buying. You will be responsible for all shipping fees, customs fees, taxes, and any other fees involved with you receiving this item. You will be charged actual shipping cost. I do not inflate shipping fees. Shipping insurance is included with all sales. I will not ship this or any other item, anywhere other than your registered PayPal address.
